DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety exploratory efficacy KTP-001 subject lumbar disc herniation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Exploratory Efficacy KTP-001 Subjects With Lumbar Disc Herniation
DOC.criteria: Subject single contain noncontained ( extrude ) lumbar disc herniation ( L3L4 , L4L5 L5S1 ) diagnose clinical symptom and/or physical finding confirm MRI . Subject leg pain document positive straight leg raise ( SLR ) test femoral stretch test ( FST ) . Subject experience herniated disc symptom least 6 week prior study without relief pain medication therapy . Subject BMI 18 35 kg/m2 Subject sequester lumbar disc herniation intrathecal herniation confirm MRI Subject two symptomatic lumbar disc herniation Previous intradiscal therapeutic intervention lumbar surgery Presence lumbar spine disease and/or deformity lumbar disc herniation Active smoker unable abstain tobacco use 2 week prior study injection Subject history presence significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , hematologic , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease
